Producer: Amy Salko Robertson, Miranda Bailey, Francey Grace
Synopsis: Priscilla (Parker Posey) and Jack (Paul Rudd) appear to be the perfect couple, but they have a secret: She is sexually frustrated. They separate in the hope of resolving the situation. While Jack moves into a bachelor pad and begins an affair with a student, Priscilla discovers the joys of self-pleasuring and finds an unusual bedmate (Danny DeVito).
Title: The Oh in Ohio
